# SEEDLab-RSA
SEED RSA Encryption and Signature Lab

![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Language-C-blue)
![Static Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenSSL-8A2BE2)


### Compile:
```
gcc <filename.c> -lcrypto -lm
```

**Task 1**: Deriving the Private Key <br>
```
Private key d =  3587A24598E5F2A21DB007D89D18CC50ABA5075BA19A33890FE7C28A9B496AEB
```
**Task 2**: Encrypting a Message <br>
```
Message: A top secret!
Hex Coded Message: 4120746f702073656372657421

Cipher Text: 6FB078DA550B2650832661E14F4F8D2CFAEF475A0DF3A75CACDC5DE5CFC5FADC

Plain Text after decryption (Hex): 4120746F702073656372657421
Plain Text after decryption (ASCII): A top secret!
```
**Task 3**: Decrypting a Message <br>
```
Cipher Text: 8C0F971DF2F3672B28811407E2DABBE1DA0FEBBBDFC7DCB67396567EA1E2493F
Plain Text after decryption (Hex): 50617373776F72642069732064656573
Plain Text after decryption (ASCII): Password is dees
```
**Task 4**: Signing a Message <br>
```
Message: I owe you $2000.
Hex Coded Message: 49206f776520796f752024323030302e

Signature: 55A4E7F17F04CCFE2766E1EB32ADDBA890BBE92A6FBE2D785ED6E73CCB35E4CB
```
**Task 5**: Verifying a Signature <br>
<br>
**Valid Signature:**
```
Message: Launch a missile.
Message (Hex): 4C61756E63682061206D697373696C652E
Signature: 643D6F34902D9C7EC90CB0B2BCA36C47FA37165C0005CAB026C0542CBDB6802F

Signature Verified.

Plain Text after decryption (Hex): 4C61756E63682061206D697373696C652E
Plain Text after decryption (ASCII): Launch a missile.
```
**Invalid Signature:**
```
Message: Launch a missile.
Message (Hex): 4C61756E63682061206D697373696C652E
Signature: 643D6F34902D9C7EC90CB0B2BCA36C47FA37165C0005CAB026C0542CBDB6803F


Invalid Signature!
Decrypred Signature: 91471927C80DF1E42C154FB4638CE8BC726D3D66C83A4EB6B7BE0203B41AC294 is different from original message.
```
**Task 6**: Manually Verifying an X.509 Certificate <br>
```
sha384sum: BB9439D7CAE06A96858157AF070501EEC19641C43F04E4661831E4A47D85A998C65AA209390AF84F72D3B7EBD7577843

Signature: 

Decrypted Padded Signature: 

Extracting last 48 bytes or 96 chars since for hashing SHA384 was used which is 48 bytes long
Decrypted Signature: BB9439D7CAE06A96858157AF070501EEC19641C43F04E4661831E4A47D85A998C65AA209390AF84F72D3B7EBD7577843

Signature Verified as original sha384sum is same as Decrypted Signature
```
